com.percussion.publisher.client
Interface IPSContentPublisherContext

public interface IPSContentPublisherContext

This interface defines a few methods to access top level (not item level) publish information.

getDebugMode

boolean getDebugMode()
Deprecated. use Log4j.Logger.isDebugEnabled() instead.

Get method that returns debug mode.

Returns:
boolean - debug mode true if debug mode is on, otherwise false.

IPSLogger getLogger()
Deprecated. use log4j.Logger.getLogger(Class) or log4j.Logger.getLogger(String name) instead.

Get method that returns com.percussion.tools.Logger object which is derived from log4j.Logger.

Returns:
Logger for this class, never be null.

ersion string - never empty or null.

getRxServerPort

int getRxServerPort()
Returns the Rhythmyx server port number to be used.

Returns:
the Rhythmyx port number to use, 0 if no Rhythmyx server port is defined.

getRxServerSSLPort

int getRxServerSSLPort()
Returns the Rhythmyx server SSL port number to be used.

Returns:
the Rhythmyx SSL port number to use, 0 if no Rhythmyx server SSL port is defined.

getStatusURL

String getStatusURL()
Get method that returns URL to post the publisher status. Specified in the properties file.

Returns:
String - URL to post the status, may be null.

getUserid

String getUserid()
Get method that returns userid to access the main Rx application

Returns:
String - userid, may be null.

getDestSite

IPSPublisherSiteContext getDestSite()
Get method for the destition site context object

Returns:
destination site context, never be null.

getSSLPort

int getSSLPort()
Get method that returns the port to use for SSL socket communications. If a non-zero value is returned, then the client should make https requests for content items using this port.

Returns:
the port, or 0 to indicate this value has not been set or was set to a non-numeric value.

getParam

String getParam(String paramName)
Method to get the parameter value given the name of the parameter. The parameter names allowed here are the ones defined as the configuration parameters for the publisher. A typical use of this would be in a plug-in where the user needs to access a user type configuration parameter for the publisher.

Parameters:
paramName - name must not null.
Returns:
parameter value, may be null or empty.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - when the argument is null.

getLogLocation

String getLogLocation()
                      throws com.percussion.publisher.client.PSInvalidPublisherEditionDataException
Get the location for the publisher log files. If the location parameter is provided absolute (starting with "/" or "?:/"), it will be used. If the location is provided relative, it will be relative to the directory. If the parameter is not specified in the current context, the default (/publog) is returned.

Returns:
the publisher log file location, never null.
Throws:
PSInvalidPublisherEditionDataException - if the log location is invalid.

getJdbcJndiEnvironment

Properties getJdbcJndiEnvironment()
Get the jndi environment for jdbc lookups for the provided parameters. This will only return the environment properties if all required are specified. Required are Context.INITIAL_CONTEXT_FACTORY<.code> and Context.PROVIDER_URL.

Returns:
the jdbc jndi lookup environment properties if found, null otherwise.

getServerRequestTimeout

int getServerRequestTimeout()
Returns the config parameter value for the server request time out in seconds. Returns 0 if it was not specified.

getFtpReloginItemCount

int getFtpReloginItemCount()
Returns the config parameter value for the ftp relogin itemcount. Returns a huge value if it was not specified.

getUsePassiveMode

boolean getUsePassiveMode()
Returns the config parameter value that indicates whether to use Active mode (false) or Passive mode (true). Defaults to false (Active mode) if not found in the database.

getFtpRcvTimeout

int getFtpRcvTimeout()
